website_summaries.verdict: K-Swiss Heritage Light L shoes provide a clean and streamlined look reminiscent of the court. The posh styling comes with a well-crafted build that guarantees durability.However, the shoes are not just all about style and sturdiness as they’re quite comfy too. In fact, they’re excellent for just about any regular everyday activity including walking and driving. The only drawback to these shoes is that they’re slightly heavy, but that’s understandable since they’re made out of smooth leather.
pros: Several reviewers were highly satisfied with the style of K-Swiss Heritage Light L shoes
Some users were delighted with the comfortability of these low-top sneakers
K-Swiss Heritage Light L shoes provide “great value” and “are unbelievable for the price” according to a good number of purchasers
These lifestyle sneakers are highly recommended by a few people because they are great for everyday wear
They also do well for driving, one person added
One tester reported that these shoes are highly durable
A handful commended the colorways of the leisure shoes
K-Swiss Heritage Light L kicks in the white colorway were particularly mentioned
The shoes are true to size according to some buyers
cons: K-Swiss Heritage Light L sneakers are slightly heavy, one person reported

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I have worn K Swiss shoes for a long time and these do not disappoint, bought 3 pair as they were such a great shoe and a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: Very great shoes that hold up well.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes. I have a similar pair from years back and while definitely worn, they are still solid and not too bad looking for their age. These seem to be similar, which is a good thing. I wear them for jobs where I both walk and stand for hours, and they are perfectly comfortable for either, and look great with either jeans or khakis.
customer_reviews.author: jfmi

customer_reviews.title: Great, versatile sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these sneakers. Well built and they look great based on the complements I have been getting.
customer_reviews.author: OCRSpartan

customer_reviews.title: Well built, sturdy but light!
customer_reviews.text: Tried two pair of Adidas before moving to KSwiss. The Adidas interior heel degraded and started rubbing. The KSwiss built much better! Light but sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly comfortable and light. They were originally stiff when purchased but after one day they were broken in and fit nicely.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I think K-Swiss is the most comfortable sneaker I've ever wore. I had a pair over 15 years ago and that was the most comfortable shoe I ever had. 2 years ago I got it fair of all white sneakers and they were great. I wanted to get something a little bit less bulky and nice shoes are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Robert R Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought another pair there correct fit my super wife feet correctly thanks
customer_reviews.author: JAMES DERR

customer_reviews.title: Dope kicks
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this purchase. They arrived quickly and look great.
customer_reviews.author: David Brussack

customer_reviews.title: They are true to size so order the size you always wear and you should be fine.
customer_reviews.text: I like the style options K Swiss has to offer and especially since many shoe stores don't carry the brand. It's good value for the money and the size is true. I wear size 11 and they fit just great so order the size you always wear. Only down side is that they take a bit to break in but after that I love them and I never had had to make a return.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them and says they're comfy, we both love the way they look
customer_reviews.author: Miroslaw Mirowski

customer_reviews.title: I really great shoe for around the house or driving.
customer_reviews.text: Great every day shoe. Nice white attention grabbing shoe that gets a few double takes. Thinner soft sneaker soap is great for driving.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Harper

customer_reviews.title: K-Swiss OK
customer_reviews.text: Finally a pair of K-Swiss that fit like the old type of sneakers- light and leather that will conform to the foot
customer_reviews.author: Skullcommando

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking k swiss, unbelievable for the price. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Very good pair of sneakers, the color, the texture and the style, very proud too get them an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Yakku

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the way these look after trying on many pairs of different styles and brands. I also loved the K-Swiss Men's Court Pro II T CMF Sneaker, Black/White, but these won out only because I can probably wear them to work a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: W. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Leather vs cloth
customer_reviews.text: My cloth version of this shoe are a bit more comfortable. The leather option is easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Merced P.

product_meta.title: K-Swiss Men's Heritage Light L Sneaker
product_meta.description: Designed with a lightweight, yet durable eva midsole, the heritage light l is an updated take on classic K-Swiss court style. Its all-leather upper features signature K-Swiss details like a printed 5 stripes detail and one-piece toe styling. The heritage light l’s rubber outsole features a pattern tread designed for enhanced traction and stability. Combining classic elements and modern styling, the heritage light l is an ideal choice for an everyday, low-top sneaker with a unique material design.
